feed:
Jekyll<link href="http://localhost:4000/feed.xml" rel="self" type="application/atom+xml"$
Jekyll requires blog post files to be named according to the following format:
YEAR-MONTH-DAY-title.MARKUP
Where YEAR is a four-digit number, MONTH and DAY are both t$
Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:
def print_hi(name) puts "Hi, #{name}" end print_hi('Tom') #=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.
